name: Net and Trident

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 15, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), Net Adept, Two-Weapon Fighting.

sections.body: You can treat a net as a one-handed ranged weapon, allowing you to wield a light or one-handed melee weapon and still make ranged attacks with your net. When you use your light or one-handed melee weapon to attack an entangled opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls and on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A net is a two-handed ranged weapon.
sections.name: Normal

description: Your skill with lighter weapons allows you to wield one alongside your net.
